text: وَدَخَلَ جَنَّتَهُۥ وَهُوَ ظَالِمٌ لِّنَفْسِهِۦ قَالَ مَآ أَظُنُّ أَن تَبِيدَ هَـٰذِهِۦٓ أَبَدًا

translation.en.sahih: And he entered his garden while he was unjust to himself. He said, "I do not think that this will perish - ever.
translation.id.indonesian: Dan dia memasuki kebunnya sedang dia zalim terhadap dirinya sendiri; ia berkata: "Aku kira kebun ini tidak akan binasa selama-lamanya,
